title: LF someone to duo with to help me achieve gold
body: I've been playing this game since the beginning of S4, and I'm only silver 5, I play ranked all the time, but never move. Please help me achieve gold before the end of season! Looking for a duo partner to play with that is highsilver/gold that can help me or climb with me.

replies.body:
hey i added u in game let me know when u wanna duo
{{champion:154}}

i didnt accept, bc i logged into league, got a friend request, had forgotton about this post and thought it was someone from a previous match

anywho, i added you
